entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing. Risk of thunderstorms near the Cariboo mountains early this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
